Score a package for NEWS files updated to current version

Source: R/assess_news_current.R
metric_score.pkg_metric_news_current.Rd

Coerce a logical vector of discovered up-to-date NEWS to a metric score

# S3 method for pkg_metric_news_current
metric_score(x, ...)

Arguments

x

a pkg_metric_news_current packge metric object
...

additional arguments unused

Value

1 if any NEWS files are up-to-date, otherwise 0

See also

Other metric_score.* functions: metric_score.pkg_metric_covr_coverage(), metric_score.pkg_metric_downloads_1yr(), metric_score.pkg_metric_export_help(), metric_score.pkg_metric_has_bug_reports_url(), metric_score.pkg_metric_has_maintainer(), metric_score.pkg_metric_has_news(), metric_score.pkg_metric_has_source_control(), metric_score.pkg_metric_has_vignettes(), metric_score.pkg_metric_has_website(), metric_score.pkg_metric_last_30_bugs_status(), metric_score.pkg_metric_license()

Examples

metric_score(assess_news_current(pkg_ref("riskmetric")))

#> [1] 0
